resources.string: Power could be intoxicating, but having no higher authority to turn to \u2014 being the final word \u2014 had a way of slowly crushing men of conscience\n -- Kyle Mills

Professional success is hard, but it\'s not complicated. The foundation to achievement and fulfillment, almost without excpetion, requires that you hone a useful craft and then apply it to things that people care about.\n\u2014Slashdot post 11/21/16
We can\'t make ourselves want what\'s good for us or what\'s good for other people. We don\'t get to choose the people we are.\n\u2014Donna Tartt
I cannot imagine mastering the skills involved here without a clearer understanding of who is going to be impressed.\n\u2014Calvin and Hobbes
Shame has gone missing from our lives, and that\'s a goddamn shame.\n\u2014Bette Midler
Everything wants to be mediocre, so what it takes to make anything more than mediocre is such a fucking act of will.\n\u2014Ira Glass

string-array.name: say_what_arr
string-array.item: Power could be intoxicating, but having no higher authority to turn to \u2014 being the final word \u2014 had a way of slowly crushing men of conscience\n\u2014Kyle Mills

Professional success is hard, but it\'s not complicated. The foundation to achievement and fulfillment, almost without excpetion, requires that you hone a useful craft and then apply it to things that people care about.\n\u2014Slashdot post 11/21/16
We can\'t make ourselves want what\'s good for us or what\'s good for other people. We don\'t get to choose the people we are.\n\u2014Donna Tartt
I cannot imagine mastering the skills involved here without a clearer understanding of who is going to be impressed.\n\u2014Calvin and Hobbes
Shame has gone missing from our lives, and that\'s a goddamn shame.\n\u2014Bette Midler
Everything wants to be mediocre, so what it takes to make anything more than mediocre is such a fucking act of will.\n\u2014Ira Glass
